name: MUSICKI
description:
Created for Global Game Jam 2017 by Full Moon Studios, MUSICKI is a challenging rhythm based platformer where the terrain is based on the beat and pitch of the song. Control your momentum as you roll, jump, and tumble across the and try to survive to the end of the song!

Controls:

  • [A][D]: Move/accelerate left/right
  • [W]/[Space]: Jump
  • [Esc]: Main Menu
